name: Music Labyrinth -3
description: The aim of this project is to develop a game based on the conceptuality that is of the either an immersive music labyrinth or that of a mystical music soundscape, in a 3D virtual environment using ‘Unity’ software. Through the idea the Music Labyrinth is to explore and discover, as the main objective with a formal aspect of user-experience through engagement. This is by the player, user to seek out new sounds as different music tracks, through interaction with objects in the space or environment. The user of this will be through having a secret quest to finding the object that can be negotiated to a new music track, which will then lead the player to a new part of the environment.
